question: I wud like to ask if a can a wife masturbate her hubby wit her feet If want her to? Or is this haram?...
answer:
QUESTION

Slmz, brother I wud like to ask if a can a wife masturbate her hubby wit her feet If want her to? Or is this haram?

 if not then pls tell e ther reason y? 
Also r men allowed to remove their hairs of their chest if his wife requests it?

 

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

1)      It is permissible.

 

وَيَجُوزُ أَنْ يَسْتَمْنِيَ بِيَدِ زَوْجَتِهِ وَخَادِمَتِهِ

 

لِأَنُ بِيَدِ زَوْجَتِهِ وَنَحْوِهَا فِيهِ سَفْحُ الْمَاءِ لَ كِنْ بِالِاسْتِمْتَاعِ بِجُزْءٍ مُبَاحٍ كَمَا لَوْ أَنْزَلَ بِتَفْخِيذٍ أَوْ تَبْطِينٍ بِخِلَافِ مَا إذَا كَانَ بِكَفِّهِ وَنَحْوَِّ فِعْلَه

(Raddul Muhtaar 2:399 HMSaeed)

 

2) It is permissible for a man to remove hairs on the chest upon the request of his wife.

 

وَفِي حَلْقِ شَعْرِ الصَّدْرِ وَالظَّهْرِ تَرْكُ الْأَدَبِ كَذَا فِي الْقُنْيَةِ ا هـ ط

(Raddul Muhtaar 6:407 HMSaeed)

And Allah knows best

 

Ml. Abdul Hameed,
Student Darul Iftaa
